resources.string: Copyright © 2019 MoPay Developer \n All rights reserved

E-wallet android application that allows users to make or accept eCommerce and mCommerce transaction payments. The project has been titled ‘MoPay’. The MoPay project is intended to make it easy for organisations to provide their customers with a means of making secure mobile and online payments. The system will reduce in-store cash handling, allow users to conveniently pay with their smartphones, automatically keep merchants’ and customers’ transaction records
